data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Blue Nile, which originates at Lake Tana in Ethiopia, provides on average some 58% of the Nile's Egyptian waters. This ____ has a steeper ____ and ____ flows ____ swiftly ____ the White Nile, which ____ joins ____ Khartoum. Unlike ____ White Nile, ____ Blue Nile carries a considerable ____ of ____. For several kilometers north of Khartoum, water closer to the eastern bank of the river, coming from the Blue Nile, is visibly muddy, while that closer to the western bank, and coming from the White Nile, is clearer.
data.partBlankContent: The Blue Nile, which originates at Lake Tana in Ethiopia, provides on average some 58% of the Nile's Egyptian waters. This ri___ has a steeper grad____ and ther_____ flows mo__ swiftly th__ the White Nile, which i_ joins a_ Khartoum. Unlike t__ White Nile, t__ Blue Nile carries a considerable amo___ of sedi____. For several kilometers north of Khartoum, water closer to the eastern bank of the river, coming from the Blue Nile, is visibly muddy, while that closer to the western bank, and coming from the White Nile, is clearer.
data.answer: 青尼罗河发源于埃塞俄比亚的塔纳湖，平均提供了埃及尼罗河58%的水。这条河的坡度更陡，因此比白尼罗河流得快，白尼罗河在喀土穆汇合。与白尼罗河不同，青尼罗河携带着大量的沉积物。在喀土穆以北几公里的地方，靠近河东岸的青尼罗河水明显是泥泞的，而靠近河西岸的白尼罗河水则比较清澈。
